name: Ninja Man vs The Green Sticks of Doom IV (Save the Battery Hens)
name_original: Ninja Man vs The Green Sticks of Doom IV (Save the Battery Hens)
description:
Ninja Man vs The Green Sticks of Doom IV (Save the Battery Hens)

You have been hired by a compassionate billionaire to crack down on the factory farming practices of the Green Sticks of Doom, however all is not as it seems...

Handcrafted with an immaculate eye towards the neo-janky aesthetic, Ninja Man vs The Green Sticks of Doom IV is the latest offering from the high priest of the genre.

A homage to the games I made and wanted to make in my childhood.

Made for MiniLD #68.
